subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Guillén had a run-scoring single and Iván Rodríguez hit a three-run double in the first inning against Johan Santana yesterday as the Detroit Tigers held on for a 4-3 victory against the host Minnesota Twins. The victory pulled the Tigers to two and a half games behind the Yankees in the American League wild-card race.
